data.md:MetaData: Tree-ring measurements of Larix sibirica (Siberian larch) from sample KULYUMLA-32

Slope 0 deg, Geology: Limestone mit org. Aufl. , Tree line 710 m, av. Tree height 20 m, Tree cover 60%, Shrub cover 50%, Herb cover 80%, Moss cover 20%, Vegatation type: Krautreicher Lä-Hochwald, Film number: 871A
